thread.section_title: Stock Market & Finance News - Wall Street Journal
thread.title: UBS Swings to Quarterly Loss After Hit From U.S. Tax Reform

author: Brian Blackstone
title: UBS Swings to Quarterly Loss After Hit From U.S. Tax Reform
text:
ZURICH—The U.S. corporate tax overhaul pushed UBS Group AG into a fourth-quarter loss, the Swiss bank said Monday even as it touted the plan’s long-term benefits, making it the latest major bank to take an immediate hit from the legislation.
The Swiss banking giant announced a series of other changes including its first share repurchase program since the financial crisis, a higher dividend and big changes to its key wealth management unit. It is combining the global and Americas wealth divisions that oversee a combined $2.3...
